Package proj

Class SchoolListCtrl

java.lang.Object
proj.SchoolListCtrl
public class SchoolListCtrl
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the control for schoolList which holds an array list of Schools.
Since:
2020-11-19
Version:
1.0
Author:
DSAI/1 Group 5

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.util.Scanner sc
    Scanner to read admin user input

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SchoolListCtrl()
    Reads in the list of schools from serializeDB.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addCourseToSchool​(java.lang.String schoolID, Course selectedCourse)

    Allows admin to choose a valid school to set or change.

    When called, save the current edited schoolList object to SerializeDB.

    • SchoolListCtrl

      public SchoolListCtrl()
      Reads in the list of schools from serializeDB.

  • Method Details

    • getSchoolList

      public java.util.ArrayList<School> getSchoolList()
      Gets the school list stored in this schoolListControl Class.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of schools

    • getSchool

      public School getSchool​(int i)
      Gets a school from this control class's studentList indexed by the parameter i.
      Parameters:
      i - index of the school in the schoolList
      Returns:
      a School object

    • checkSchool

      public boolean checkSchool​(java.lang.String schoolID)
      Checks if the schoolID the admin has inputted is valid by checking the schoolList ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      schoolID - The schoolID of the school.
      Returns:
      true if the school exists, false if it does not exist.

    • getSchoolSize

      public int getSchoolSize()
      Gets the number of schools stored in the schoolList ArrayList.
      Returns:
      The size of the schoolList ArrayList which is the number of schools.

    • chooseSchool

      public java.lang.String chooseSchool()
      Allows admin to choose a valid school to set or change.
      Returns:
      A valid schoolID of the chosen school the admin user has inputted.

    • getCurrentAccessPeriod

      public void getCurrentAccessPeriod​(java.lang.String schoolID)
      Gets the AccessPeriod of a school.
      Parameters:
      schoolID - The schoolID of the school we are getting AccessPeriod from.

    • editAccessPeriod

      public void editAccessPeriod​(java.lang.String schoolID, java.util.Date startDate, java.util.Date endDate) throws java.text.ParseException
      Allows the admin to edit the AccessPeriod of a school by inputting the schoolID of the school and the respect start and end dates.
      Parameters:
      schoolID - The schoolID of the school whose AccessPeriod is to be edited.
      startDate - The start Date of the new AccessPeriod.
      endDate - The end Date of the new AccessPeriod.
      Throws:
      java.text.ParseException - Signals that an error has been reached unexpectedly while parsing.

    • addCourseToSchool

      public void addCourseToSchool​(java.lang.String schoolID, Course selectedCourse)
      Allows admin to add a course to a selected School.
      Parameters:
      schoolID - The schoolID of the school the admin wants to put the course in.
      selectedCourse - The course object the admin is assigning the school to.

    • removeCourseFromSchool

      public void removeCourseFromSchool​(java.lang.String schoolID, Course selectedCourse)
      Allows admin to remove the selected Course from its school.
      Parameters:
      schoolID - The schoolID of the school
      selectedCourse - The course object that we wish to remove from school.

    • getSchoolFromCourse

      public java.lang.String getSchoolFromCourse​(java.lang.String courseID)
      Gets the school that the course belongs to.
      Parameters:
      courseID - The courseID of the course.
      Returns:
      The schoolID the course belongs to.

    • printSchoolList

      public void printSchoolList()
      Prints the list of schools under schoolList ArrayList.

    • save

      public void save()
      When called, save the current edited schoolList object to SerializeDB.
